body:
Hey everyone! Many of you think that the community is "dying" and players are leaving here and there. So, I made a quick little Nebula video, made it sound like a really fun game, so that hopefully some of my viewers can join Avicus!

I will definitely be starting to record more Nebula, because I've seen that many, many players enjoy both playing it, and watching it, so hopefully we get some new players! ^o^

Anyways, thank you to everyone for supporting me with my YouTube channel, and I hope you guys have an awesome day!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d_ytSkHbExk
body_tagged:

title: New Nebula Video! [New Avicus Players?]

replies.body: good on you Porky, you've earned a deserved like for this, it's awesome what you're doing for the benefit of the community and i hope your viewers join too :)

Btw how did you upload your video?

Suggest doing topic :P
but nice vid! ^.^

replies.body:
@OPTOBAT - Thanks a lot, it's really nice to get feedback! :D

@vsplesk101 - That happens to me a lot, but what I do is either just refresh the page, or close my browser and open it again. Try that a couple of times and it should work! :)

@miningflamingo - Thanks, I try! ^o^
